description:
Appropriate for climbing applications that don't require the strength of pre-sewn slings. Variety of colours available, lets you use a different colour to indicate different sling lengths.

  • This product is sold by the metre
  • Made of nylon
  • 24mm width
  • Breaking strength is approximately 20kN (2041kg)
  • Note: tying a knot in webbing reduces strength and does not meet the CE sling standard of 22kN, which is achievable with pre-sewn slings
name: Web Source 1" (24mm) Nylon Flat Climbing Webbing
